title: Bonnet Veil, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: machine embroidery on machine-made net
description: Repeating scalloped border with large leaf set into each scallop along the bottom edge. Motifs are embroidered in a chain stitch onto a net ground. Narrow scroll along remaining three edges and dotted field.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bonnet Veil, late 19th century.Medium: silk
Technique: machine embroidery on machine-made net. 1977-76-1.
